thread.title: Lions snap 3-game skid in 30-17 win over struggling Packers
thread.title_full: Lions snap 3-game skid in 30-17 win over struggling Packers

posts.title: Lions snap 3-game skid in 30-17 win over struggling Packers
posts.text:
Lions snap 3-game skid in 30-17 win over struggling Packers - KFVS12 News & Weather Cape Girardeau, Carbondale, Poplar Bluff Member Center: Lions snap 3-game skid in 30-17 win over struggling Packers 2017-11-07T06:53:10Z 2017-11-07T07:56:52Z (AP Photo/Matt Ludtke). Detroit Lions' Golden Tate gets past Green Bay Packers' Josh Jones and Davon House during the second half of an NFL football game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Green Bay, Wis. (AP Photo/Matt Ludtke). Green Bay Packers' Aaron Rodgers talks to Detroit Lions' Golden Tate and Matthew Stafford before an NFL football game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Green Bay, Wis. (AP Photo/Mike Roemer). Detroit Lions' Matthew Stafford drops back with Green Bay Packers' Mike Daniels rushing during the first half of an NFL football game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Green Bay, Wis. (AP Photo/Matt Ludtke). Detroit Lions' D.J. Hayden breaks up a pass intended for Green Bay Packers' Davante Adams during the first half of an NFL football game Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Green Bay, Wis. (AP Photo/Matt Ludtke). Detroit Lions' Ameer Abdullah celebrates his touchdown run with teammate Marvin Jones (11) during the first half of an NFL football game against the Green Bay Packers Monday, Nov. 6, 2017, in Green Bay, Wis. 
By GENARO C. ARMASAP Sports Writer 
GREEN BAY, Wis. (AP) - Eager to end a three-game losing streak, the Detroit Lions picked a tough place to make a stand - Lambeau Field in a Monday night game against the Green Bay Packers. 
Matthew Stafford delivered with his sharpest performances of the season. 
Stafford passed for 361 yards and two touchdowns to Marvin Jones, and Golden Tate added 113 yards on seven catches in a 30-17 win over the offensively challenged Packers. 
"We went into this game thinking that this needed to be a statement game," Tate said. 
The Lions (4-4) began the season 3-1 before losing three straight. The win over the Packers allowed Detroit to stay within two games of the NFC North-leading Minnesota Vikings, who had a bye this week. 
Detroit has the best quarterback in the division now that Green Bay's Aaron Rodgers is sidelined with a broken right collarbone. 
Stafford was 26-of-33 passing, including 12 of 14 in the first half with a 25-yard touchdown pass to Jones. Stafford finished with a season-high 132.4 quarterback rating. 
"He can sling it anywhere, and you just have to be there to catch it," Jones said. "When he's on, there's no other quarterback I'd rather play with." 
Green Bay (4-4) finally got in the end zone on Brett Hundley's 1-yard quarterback sneak with 9:52 left. 
The Lions answered with Stafford's 11-yard touchdown pass to Jones with 8:06 remaining, putting the game out of reach with a 17-point lead. Jones had seven catches for 107 yards. 
The Packers have lost three straight. Their once-potent offense has struggled since Rodgers went down on Oct. 15 at Minnesota. 
"We come out winning Super Bowls around here. If we keep playing like this, it's not going to be pretty," cornerback Davon House said. 
Other notes and takeaways from the game: 
HUNDLEY'S DAY: Hundley finished 26 of 38 for 245 yards but rarely took shots down the field, especially in the first half. Cornerback Darius Slay blanketed Jordy Nelson when the Packers did try to throw long while the game was still competitive. 
"Brett Hundley played better tonight and I have great faith in Brett Hundley. Brett Hundley's not our issue," coach Mike McCarthy said . 
Hundley was most effective again when scrambling outside of the pocket. He also showed some poise in a hurry-up offense that led to the Packers getting a 35-yard field goal from Mason Crosby to close out the first half to get within 14-3. 
THIRD DOWNS: The Packers had other problems, too, rushing for 78 yards on 17 carries. They were just 2 of 9 on third downs. The Lions were 8 of 13 on third-down conversions behind clutch throws from the rocket-armed Stafford. 
RED ZONE: It was a mixed day in the red zone for the Lions after a poor game inside the 20 last week against the Steelers. Besides Jones' 11-yard touchdown catch, Ameer Abdullah had a 4-yard scoring run in the second quarter that gave Detroit a 14-0 lead. They also had to settle for a 19-yard field goal early in the fourth quarter after getting stopped on three straight plays at the 1. 
CRITICAL PENALTY: The Lions' opening score was set up by an unnecessary roughness penalty on Mike Daniels after the defensive lineman appeared to head-butt Detroit center Travis Swanson. The flag negated an incompletion on third-and-15 that would have forced the Lions to punt from their own 25. Stafford connected with Jones for the touchdown pass five plays later. 
"I really take that on myself. If we stop them there, then we get a short field. ... I let the emotions get the best of me," Daniels said. 
INJURIES: Packers safety Morgan Burnett left in the third quarter with a groin injury. He had returned from a two-game absence for a hamstring injury. Right tackle Bryan Bulaga left in the fourth quarter with what appears to be a serious knee injury. The Packers had their starting offensive line back together for only two-plus quarters after left guard Lane Taylor had returned from a one-game absence with an ankle injury. 
___

thread.title: Seguin gets questionable first rock-paper-scissors win over Scheifele | NHL.com
thread.title_full: Seguin gets questionable first rock-paper-scissors win over Scheifele | NHL.com

posts.title: Seguin gets questionable first rock-paper-scissors win over Scheifele | NHL.com
posts.text:
Seguin gets questionable first rock-paper-scissors win over Scheifele What exactly did the Stars forward throw to win? Seguin, Scheifele square off WPG@DAL: Seguin tops Scheifele in rock-paper-scissors Tyler Seguin and Mark Scheifele meet in another battle of rock-paper-scissors to determine who will leave the ice first after warmups in Dallas 00:19 • 
Tyler Seguin finally beat Mark Scheifele at rock-paper-scissors, kind of. 
The Dallas Stars forward and Winnipeg Jets forward have a standing game of R-P-S that takes place at the end of warmups whenever their teams play. 
Before Monday's game, Seguin... won? 
Video of the matchup showed Scheifele clearly threw out scissors. 
But Seguin? He kind of threw a rock/paper hybrid with wiggling, rounded fingers. 
Scheifele walked off in disbelief. A laughing Seguin followed knowing he protected home ice. 
Let's hope this is a best of seven series.

posts.title: Aushungern als Waffe
posts.text:
Bild in Lightbox öffnen. Bildlegende: Am stärksten leiden die Kinder: Ghouta ist seit vier Jahren abgeriegelt und unter Beschuss. Imago 
Juliette Touma vom UNO-Kinderhilfswerk Unicef kann die schrecklichen Bilder hungernder Kleinkinder nicht mit letzter Gewissheit zuordnen, die letzten Monat auftauchten. Es gibt keine unabhängige Bestätigung, dass sie aus Goutha stammen. Zusatzinhalt überspringen Hungernde Kinder 
Die Bilder, die letzten Monat aus den östlichen Vororten von Damaskus kamen, sind nur schwer zu ertragen: Sie zeigen bis auf die Knochen ausgemergelte Kleinkinder, denen vor Hunger offensichtlich die Kraft fehlt überhaupt noch zu schreien. Der Ursprung der Fotos ist jedoch nicht bestätigt, unabhängige Berichterstatter gibt es in dem Gebiet keine. 
Aber Touma kann bestätigen, dass die Versorgungskrise in dem Gebiet unmittelbar östlich der syrischen Hauptstadt Damaskus gross ist. Die Unterernährung ist die naheliegende Folge. Nur wenige Hilfskonvois kommen durch 
«Vor ein paar Tagen war es erstmals überhaupt seit einem Monat wieder möglich, etwas Hilfe zu bringen», sagt Touma. Ein Konvoi sei in zwei kleine Orte im Gebiet Ghouta eingelassen worden. Vor Ort hätten die Kollegen gesehen, dass die Bedürfnisse immens seien. 
Trotz des Vormarschs der syrischen Regierungstruppen und ihrer Verbündeten in fast allen Landesteilen ist das kleine Gebiet östlich von Damaskus noch immer Rebellengebiet. 
Mehrheitlich islamistische Kämpfer verschiedener Gruppierungen halten sich dort verschanzt. Sie versuchen dem Bombardement der Assad-Truppen zu trotzen, kämpfen aber auch immer wieder gegeneinander. Keine Rücksicht auf Zivilisten 
Das Regime belagert das rund 15 Kilometer lange und breite Gebiet seit vier Jahren. Es schnürt Ghouta von der Versorgung ab, um die Rebellen in die Knie zu zwingen. Es ist dies eine Taktik des Aushungers, die auch anderswo in Syrien zur Anwendung kam. Rücksicht auf eingeschlossene Zivilisten wird keine genommen. Das sah ein UNO-Mitarbeiter kürzlich in Ghouta Women and children are particularly suffering in besieged #EastGhouta . Listen to @franequiza who led the @UN @SYRedCrescent convoy last week pic.twitter.com/CN94TZ01NG — OCHA Syria (@OCHA_Syria) 6. November 2017 
Fast eine halbe Million Menschen sollen in Ghouta noch ausharren. Seit Jahren bemüht sich die UNO Monat für Monat beim Regime Assad um Bewilligungen für Hilfslieferungen. Doch nur ein Bruchteil davon wird tatsächlich bewilligt. Vereinbarung ohne Wirkung 
Ghouta gehört zu jenen Zonen, in denen die Kämpfe gemäss den Vereinbarungen zwischen Russland, Iran, der Türkei und dem Assad-Regime im Prinzip reduziert werden sollen. 
Doch der Beschuss und die Belagerung gehen offensichtlich weiter. Selbst Schulen und Kindergärten seien Ziel der Angriffe, berichtet Unicef. Die Rebellen ihrerseits schiessen zurück. Der UNO bleibt nicht viel mehr, als die Belagerung von Zivilisten und deren Beschuss zu verurteilen. Kinder leiden ganz besonders 
«Noch immer haben wir in Syrien keinen stabilen Zugang zu ungefähr zwei Millionen Kindern», sagt Unicef-Vertreterin Touma. Sie leben in belagerten Gebieten wie Ghouta oder in Gebieten, in denen immer noch gekämpft wird. Auch andernorts werde die Nahrungsmittel-Hilfe erschwert. 
«Doch das darf nicht sein», sagt die Unicef-Sprecherin. Einmal mehr appelliert sie an alle Seiten im seit mehr als sechs Jahre dauernden syrischen Konflikt, die Zivilbevölkerung zu schützen. Und ganz besonders die Kinder. 1 Die Versorgungskrise in der belagerten Ghouta ist riesig 2:37 min aus HeuteMorgen vom 07.11.2017 Bildlegende: Das Gebiet Ghouta liegt östlich von Damaskus. Dazu gehört auch die Stadt Duma. Das von den Assad-Truppen belagerte Gebiet hat einen Durchmesser von rund 15 Kilometern. SRF Sendungsbeitrag zu diesem Artikel FOKUS: Grausame Aushungerungs-Taktik 
Aus 10vor10 vom 7.1.2016 
Rebellen und die syrische Armee setzen beide auf eine grausame Taktik im Krieg: Die Bevölkerung in den belagerten Orten werden ausgehungert. Ein Kriegsverbrechen gegen die Menschlichkeit.

thread.title: Browns' Gordon admits drinking, drug use before 'every game'
thread.title_full: Browns' Gordon admits drinking, drug use before 'every game'

posts.title: Browns' Gordon admits drinking, drug use before 'every game'
posts.text:
Browns' Gordon admits drinking, drug use before 'every game' - KFVS12 News & Weather Cape Girardeau, Carbondale, Poplar Bluff Member Center: Browns' Gordon admits drinking, drug use before 'every game' 2017-11-06T22:24:48Z 2017-11-07T07:15:44Z (AP Photo/David Richard, File). FILE - In this Sept. 1, 2016, file photo, Cleveland Browns wide receiver Josh Gordon warms up before an NFL preseason football game against the Chicago Bears in Cleveland. On the cusp of his return from NFL suspension, B... 
By TOM WITHERSAP Sports Writer 
BEREA, Ohio (AP) - Josh Gordon has never played an NFL game sober. That has to change if he plans to play in another one. 
One day before the Browns wide receiver gets another shot at rebooting his star-crossed career, Gordon revealed in a candid magazine interview that he used drugs or alcohol before every game of his career - pro or college. 
Gordon, who was reinstated on a conditional basis by Commissioner Roger Goodell last week after being suspended for nearly three years, told GQ he drank or smoked marijuana before "every game. Probably every game of my career." 
The former Pro Bowler did the interview before meeting with Goodell in New York. Gordon said he began taking drugs in seventh grade, and he outlined a pregame routine as a pro where he would do shots of alcohol to "get the motor running." 
"We would stay at the team hotel, and then players are allowed to go back home, get what they need and then go to the game," Gordon said. "So I'd leave the hotel early morning, go home, eat breakfast, do my little ritual, whatever it may be, some weed, some alcohol and then go to the game. And then, I'd definitely be partying after every game, win or lose. Every game." 
Gordon's shocking admission came as the Browns prepared to welcome him back to their facility on Tuesday. On Monday, executive vice president of football operations Sashi Brown said the team has had limited contact with Gordon since his reinstatement. 
"We have had some preliminary conversations with him," Brown said. "We are looking forward to having him back." 
Coach Hue Jackson said Gordon's disclosure won't change the team's decision to accept him back. 
"I think he was letting things out if that is what was said," said Jackson, who coached Gordon before the 26-year-old checked himself into rehab in 2016. "I think he was cleansing himself of his past, and I get that a little bit, but again, I think he said what he felt he needed to say." 
Jackson said he planned to sit down with Gordon and discuss his disclosures, which included him saying, "a bunch of guys smoke weed before the game. But we're not talking about them." 
Gordon has been suspended three times for multiple violations of the league's substance-abuse policy. During his first stint with the Browns, Gordon said he found ways to cheat the league's rules. 
"If I had already been drug tested that week, or the day before the game, I knew I had a couple days to buy to clean my system," he said. "Even before I was getting tested for alcohol, prior to my DWI in 2014, I would take the biggest bong rip I could. And try to conceal all the smell off all my clothes. I'd be dressed up to go to the game. I would have these little pre-made shots. I used to love Grand Marnier. I could drink it down smooth. I could usually drink a lot of it. 
"But if it wasn't that, it might be a whiskey or something. And I would drink probably like half a glass, or a couple shots to try and warm my system up, basically. To get the motor running. That's what I would do for games." 
In the conditions established by Goodell, Gordon is allowed to attend team meetings and work out by himself. As long as he fulfills requirements, Gordon can begin practicing with the Browns on Nov. 20. 
Gordon has missed 51 games since 2014 due to the suspensions, derailing a career filled with so much promise. 
In the GQ piece, Gordon said he was forced to move from Ohio to Florida to escape ridicule after he was suspended. 
"I've been harassed, had drinks thrown at me," he said. "I've been (followed) in the grocery store, heckled everywhere. At the games, people harassed and heckled my brothers and my mom. Somebody dented the hood of the car. Had to sue a guy and get the money back cause he damaged the car. People are throwing money, pennies, to break the windows. So Cleveland was rough, man." 
Jackson said he's not worried that Gordon is painting a gloomy picture to get out of playing for the winless Browns. 
"I don't think he is trying to do that," he said. "I do need to feel comfortable that he is not. If he is coming back to play football, I think he knows he needs to play football here. There is no other place that he can do what he needs to do in the National Football League, I am talking about as far as playing. It is right here." 
___

thread.title_full: November 7th

posts.author: mariewillman
posts.title: November 7th
posts.text:
A Typical Tuesday
I start my day at 7:30am, so I can be at work for around 9:30 From 9:30 – 12:00, I work on the IG English curriculum.  This way, when I leave Suzhou, the work I’ve put into building the English program won’t go to waste.  Lunch is from 12:00 – 1:20.  It’s a long lunch break and most of my Chinese peers spend the time napping or resting. I use the time to prep my afternoon classes. 1:20 – 4:35 is spent teaching.  I don’t have any morning classes on Tuesday, which is really nice.  It makes for a busy afternoon, but that’s when I’m at my best… So I’m glad my classes are scheduled for then.  From 4:35 – 7:00, I spend my time tidying up my desk, traveling back to SIP and eating dinner with Dave. From 7:00 – 9:30, I try and catch up on grading.  This week alone, I have roughly 100 summaries to check for grammar, spelling, vocabulary, content and format.  Each summary takes between 4-8 minutes to grade.  9:30 -10:30 is excercise time.  On weeks when I’m really busy I like to walk after I’m done grading. Sometimes I do yoga instead, or calisthenics if I happen to have energy left from the rest of the day.  10:30 – 11:30 is time to wind down.  Lately I’ve been watching Criminal Minds and Scrubs.  Been going old-school.   11:30 is time for bed.  That’s a Typical Tuesday for this Teacher.

posts.title: Factors You Should Consider When Selecting A Personal Trainer Near Me Marlborough
posts.text:
By Kevin Fox It may be difficult for a person to train himself on physical fitness. You need to look for an instructor who will guide you throughout your training. He will be there to make sure your safety and you follow all regulations. In case you are ready to hire one, below is a guide on what you should consider when looking for a personal trainer Near Me Marlborough to handle your needs. In the first place, you need to meet a health consultant. He will do a check up on several matters on your body including the measurement of your weight, blood sugar and the blood pleasure. This will help know your body mass and the health condition. The expert will then recommend for you if you are fit or not to perform the exercise. He will also advise you on the weight you are supposed to loose among many other factors.
When hiring a trainer, it is good you first check for the pricing. Different instructors will give their service at a different rate. Consult widely on the standard rates possible. You may opt to visit different persons and get their quotations. Make sure you get the most affordable service as long as all the other factors remain constant.
One of the criteria you should use while selecting your coach is to check whether he has the permit. Some may have never applied for it even for once. Others will be operating with invalid permits. Ask for the documentary evidence of the license if possible. The grant serves as evidence that you are working with a legal person.
No one may like to be trained by a learner. While looking for the instructor, you should treat his expertise as a priority. Let him state the number of years he has been in practice. An experienced individual can give solutions to different awkward moments that may arise. Depending on your body response, money available, and what you want, he is in a position to guide you out of his vast experience. It is therefore recommended that you consider hiring a knowledgeable person.
Once you have the skilled person, you now need to request for the contacts of clients he has attended to before. If possible, he should also give direction on where you may locate them. The referees should be free to give honest and reliable data on their experience with the instructor. In case you get negative remarks, do not hesitate to look for another one.
Do not hesitate to ask for references. In case the coach has had previous experience, he must be having the contacts of clients he has been serving. Ask for the contacts and take an initiative of calling them.Get full information on their interaction. From this, you will be able to know the kind of a person you are dealing with in case he may not have changed.
Lastly, it is essential you ensure that the person you are yet to hire has all the necessary materials. In case you depend on the coach to provide the fitness machines, it may be disappointing if you realized he does not have. Be keen on this.

thread.title: Universitätsklinikum Bonn meldet neue Technologie, mit der seltene genetische Krankheiten bei Kindern besser diagnostiziert werden können
thread.title_full: Universitätsklinikum Bonn meldet neue Technologie, mit der seltene genetische Krankheiten bei Kindern besser diagnostiziert werden können

posts.title: Universitätsklinikum Bonn meldet neue Technologie, mit der seltene genetische Krankheiten bei Kindern besser diagnostiziert werden können
posts.text:
10:05 | 103 | 0 | 0 
Heute gaben das Institut für genomische Statistik und Bioinformatik (IGSB) und das Institut für Humangenetik (IHG) in Bonn eine neue Initiative bekannt, deren Ziel es ist, zur Weiterentwicklung der Präzisionsmedizin durch eine Integration der Face2Gene-Anwendungs-Suite von FDNA beizutragen. Diese Integration wird voraussichtlich zu einer Steigerung und Transformierung der diagnostischen Leistung genetischer Tests bei seltenen Krankheiten beitragen und ist die erste ihrer Art in Deutschland. 
In den meisten Fällen führen genetische Test bei Patienten mit seltenen Krankheiten nur in 25 Prozent der Fälle zur Diagnose. Diese Zusammenarbeit erweitert die genetischen Tests um Gesichtsanalyse und künstliche Intelligenz. Damit lässt sich voraussichtlich die diagnostische Ausbeute von molekularen Tests bei Tausenden von seltenen Krankheiten steigern. 
Prof. Markus Nöthen, Leiter des Instituts für Humangenetik, zufolge sind Patienten mit seltenen Krankheiten häufig Kinder, die durchschnittlich sieben Ärzte im Laufe von sieben Jahren aufsuchen, bevor die Diagnose gestellt wird. Diese Odyssee könnte deutlich verkürzt werden, wenn sich alle verfügbaren klinischen Daten effizient an die Diagnostiklabore übertragen ließen. 
Prof. Peter Krawitz, Leiter des IGSB, kommentierte: „Wir freuen uns, klinischen Daten von Patienten in unsere Pipeline zur genetischen Beurteilung zu integrieren. Damit helfen wir mit, Antworten für die Patienten zu finden, die wir betreuen. Wir rechnen damit, dass die Gesichtsanalyse von Face2Gene und Erkenntnisse aus der Phänotypisierung eine bedeutenden Einfluss auf unsere molekulare Beurteilung haben werden. Damit stellen wir sicher, dass das Universitätsklinikum Bonn seine Rolle als führendes Zentrum für genetische Services beibehält.“ 
Face2Gene wird von klinischen Genetikern weltweit zur Beurteilung von Syndromen, Genen und Phänotypen verwendet, die mit der klinischen und Gesichtsanalyse der Patienten korrelieren. Die Technologie vergleicht die klinischen Phänotypen und Gesichtsanalyse mit bekannten krankheitsverursachenden genetischen Varianten und unterstützt damit Kliniker bei der Diagnosestellung für ihre Patienten. 
„Wir sind stolz auf die Zusammenarbeit mit dem IGSB bei einer Reihe von klinischen, molekularen und Forschungsaktivitäten“, so Dekel Gelbman, CEO, FDNA. „Bonn hat seine führende Rolle auf dem Gebiet der Genetik und der selten Leiden unter Beweis gestellt. Wir freuen uns darauf zu sehen, wie unsere Zusammenarbeit einen bedeutsamen Einfluss auf das Leben der Patienten ausübt.” 
Über das IGSB 
Das IGSB ist ein in jüngster Zeit gegründetes Institut der Medizinischen Fakultät der Universität Bonn und des Universitätsklinikums Bonn, das mit dem Institut für Humangenetik auf dem Gebiet der Präzisionsmedizin zusammenarbeitet. Das IGSB leitet zurzeit auch die PEDIA-Studie, deren Ziel es ist, durch die Einbeziehung der Ergebnisse automatisierter Bildanalysen die Exom-Interpretation zu verbessern. Um Näheres dazu zu erfahren, wie die PEDIA-Priorisierung in der Diagnostik zu verwenden ist, wenden Sie sich bitte an 
Über das IHG 
Das IHG der Medizinischen Fakultät der Universität Bonn und des Universitätsklinikums Bonn bietet diagnostische Dienstleistungen für eine breite Palette an Erbkrankheiten. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter https://www.humangenetics.uni-bonn.de . 
Über FDNA und Face2Gene 
FDNA hat Face2Gene entwickelt, eine klinische Suite von Phänotypisierungsanwendungen, die umfassende und präzise Beurteilungen erleichtern. Face2Gene verwendet Gesichtsanalyse, tiefgreifendes Lernen und künstliche Intelligenz, um Big Data in umsetzbare genomische Einsichten zu verwandeln, die eine Verbesserung und Beschleunigung von Diagnostik und Therapie ermöglichen. Mit dem weltweit größten Netzwerk von Klinikern, Laboren und Wissenschaftlern, die eine der am schnellsten wachsenden und komplettesten genomischen Datenbanken der Welt erstellen, verändert FDNA das Leben von Patienten mit seltenen Erkrankungen. Weitere Informationen finden Sie unter www.FDNA.com .

thread.title: Smutná zpráva: Zemřel zpěvák Karel Štědrý (†80). Dostala ho nevyléčitelná nemoc
thread.title_full: Smutná zpráva: Zemřel zpěvák Karel Štědrý (†80). Dostala ho nevyléčitelná nemoc

posts.title: Smutná zpráva: Zemřel zpěvák Karel Štědrý (†80). Dostala ho nevyléčitelná nemoc
posts.text:
Témata článku: smrt , zpěvák , Celebrity , Karel Štědrý Populární zpěvák Karel Štědrý byl mimo jiné v letech 1959 až 1972 členem divadla Semafor, jež spoluzakládal. V pozdějších letech byl televizním a estrádním konferenciérem a moderátorem. Původním vzděláním byl železničním inženýrem, tuto profesi ale nikdy nevykonával. 
Dnes náhle zemřel populární český zpěvák Karel Štědrý ve věku 80 let. Teprve v srpnu oznámil fanouškům, že trpí nevyléčitelnou nemocí, a bohužel dnes ráno, v úterý, jí podlehl. 
Karel Štědrý se proslavil hlavně hity jako Mám malý stan, který nazpíval s Waldemarem Matuškou. Nezapomenutelný je také jeho šlágr Milenci v texaskách s Josefem Zímou či Potkal potkan potkana s Jiřím Suchým. Zahrál si i v několika filmech, například Noc na Karlštejně nebo Kdyby tisíc klarinetů. 
Moderoval četné pořady zejména pro starší generaci, jako byly Diskotéka pro starší a pokročilé, Kabaret U dobré pohody, Kavárnička dříve narozených nebo Písničky z obrazovky. 
Karel byl třikrát ženatý, z prvního manželství měl dvě dcery, které pojmenoval Zuzana a Tereza, podle hitů svého přítele a kolegy Waldemara Matušky. Z třetího manželství se narodil syn Karel. 
Karel Štědrý byl výraznou postavou české hudby. Zdroj Profimedia
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B3cjMUi6-2C-ZDJ1OTdJRGxEdlE

posts.title: 發熱衣狂銷繞地球17.5圈 最新3種暖度多冷都能穿 | 生活 | 三立新聞網 SETN.COM
posts.text:
立冬後天氣將開始逐漸降溫，想要穿的溫暖又不想要有厚重感，材質的選擇就很重要了。日系平價服飾UNIQLO最近HEATTECH發熱衣系列再推新作，針對不同溫度、環境推出全新的三種暖度，不管是一般冬天或是要到極度寒冷國家都能穿。 
UNIQLO表示，自2003年首次發表HEATTECH吸濕發熱衣，攜手日本纖維製造大廠東麗共同開發輕薄又溫暖的新型態內衣，將人體汗液（水蒸氣）產生反應後生成熱能轉換成熱能進行保溫，上市15年至今全球銷量突破10億件，布料加總長達70萬公里，可繞地球17.5圈。 ▲發熱衣至今銷售全球突破10億件。（圖／記者馮珮汶攝） 
不過最近幾年極端氣候，常常有霸王極寒流報到，品牌宣布在推出3種暖度的HEATTECH吸濕發熱衣，除了提升膚觸的柔滑滋潤，並改良縫製的方式，發表最新男裝HEATTECH無縫V領T恤(短袖)與女裝羅紋U領上衣(長袖)等系列商品 。 ▲最新男裝HEATTECH無縫V領T恤，堪稱是最輕薄的發熱衣。（圖／記者馮珮汶攝） 
品牌表示，3種款度分別為HEATTECH一般款，適合一般冬天保暖用；還有極暖HEATTECH Extra Warm可在特別寒冷時穿著，內層刷毛材質是一般款保暖度的1.5 倍，可多層次穿搭在襯衫下；最後還有超極暖HEATTECH Ultra Warm，內層加厚刷毛是一般款保暖度的2.25倍，是HEATTECH有史以來最溫暖的商品，可在極度寒冷時搭配穿著。 ▲最新男裝HEATTECH無縫V領T恤，堪稱是最輕薄的發熱衣。（圖／記者馮珮汶攝） 
因應近年來消費者穿搭，這次首度推出無縫V領T恤，也是系列中最輕薄的款式；針對女性則是推出羅紋材質，共有六種顏色；如果想要完全不外露，則可以選用網路商店獨家販售的芭蕾領口設計，不外露卻仍能達到保暖功效。當穿上像一字領等露出鎖骨和頸部的上衣時，還是可以保暖。 ▲女裝HEATTECH羅紋U領T恤(長袖)。（圖／記者馮珮汶攝） 
UNIQLO表示，11月中起展開一系列「全台送暖行動」。更首度與LINE卡通明星聯名推出貼圖，11月14日起至12月13日免費下載。 ▲女裝HEATTECH芭蕾領T恤(8分袖) ，網路商店獨家販售。（圖／記者馮珮汶攝）

thread.title: USTDA connects U.S. companies to natural gas opportunities in South Africa
thread.title_full: USTDA connects U.S. companies to natural gas opportunities in South Africa

posts.author: lacia
posts.title: USTDA connects U.S. companies to natural gas opportunities in South Africa
posts.text:
USTDA connects U.S. companies to natural gas opportunities in South Africa Tuesday, 7 November 2017 - 6:59am 
This project will create opportunities for U.S. businesses in one of South Africa's growing sectors 
The U.S. Trade and Development Agency awarded a grant to the GreenCape Sector Development Agency for a feasibility study to assess the market demand, socio-economic impacts, and key risks of a proposed integrated liquefied natural gas (LNG) importation and gas-to-power project in the Western Cape Province of South Africa. The study will also provide a preferred model for the importation of LNG for gas-to-power electricity generation capacity, as well as for industrial, transportation, commercial, and domestic uses. 
‘USTDA is pleased to support this project, which will help increase access to affordable, reliable energy in South Africa,’ said Lida Fitts, USTDA's Regional Director for Sub-Saharan Africa. "At the same time, this project will create opportunities for U.S. businesses in one of South Africa's growing sectors." 
Mike Mulcahy, CEO of GreenCape, added, ‘Natural gas has a critical complementary role to renewable energy for power generation in a lowest cost, low carbon, energy future for South Africa. GreenCape is grateful to USTDA for their support in exploring and unlocking these opportunities.’ 
GreenCape is a not-for-profit company in South Africa established by the Western Cape Government's Department of Economic Development and Tourism (DEDAT) to develop the green economy by identifying market opportunities in the energy sector, the waste sector, as well as the flow of resources in the regional economy. 
GreenCape will competitively select a U.S. firm to complete the study. Businesses interested in submitting proposals for this USTDA-funded feasibility study should visit the Federal Business Opportunities (FBO) website at www.fbo.gov . A link to the FBO announcement is also posted on USTDA's website at https://www.ustda.gov/business-opportunities .

مدينة أنطاليا لؤلؤة تركيا حيث البحر والنهر والغابات GMT 13:14   هيعاصمةالسياحةفيتركيا،إذيزورهاملايينالسياحمنكلأنحاءالعالملماتمتازبهمنجمالساحروطبيعةخلاّبةتجمعفيتناغمرائعبينالتضاريسالجغرافية،والتاريخ،وحداثةالحاضروالخدمات. تقعأنطالياعلىشريطضيقبينجبالطوروسوالشواطئالهادئةعلىالبحرالأبيضالمتوسط،وتتفرّدبجمالطبيعيقلّنظيرهفيمدنأخرى
نظراًلأهميتهاالسياحية،تحتويأنطالياعلىالعديدمنالمنتجعات،والفنادق،والمرافقالسياحيةالخاصةوالعامةالتيتناسبمختلفالأذواق. وهيمهيّأةبشكلرائعلاستقبالالسياح. فالمدينةوماحولهاتستقبلأكثرمنثلث السياح فيتركيا،ولاسيمامنروسيا،وشمالأوروباوغربها،بالإضافةالىالشرقالأوسطوجمهورياتوسطآسيا. تتميزأنطاليابجوّهاالدافئنسبياًخلالفصلالشتاء،ولذلكفإنالموسمالسياحييمتدطوالالعام،لكنهيبلغذروتهطبعاًخلالأشهرالصيف. 
الطقسفيأنطالياطقسأنطاليامعتدلخلالالشتاءوحارورطبخلالالصيف. تتميزأنطاليابسماءمشمسةمعظمأيامالسنة،ومياهبحرهادافئةنسبياًحتىفيفصلالشتاء. قدتصلدرجاتالحرارةصيفاًإلىالأربعيندرجةمئويةمصحوبةبنسبةرطوبةعالية. وفيفصلالشتاء،تنخفضدرجاتالحرارةالى 10-15 درجةمئوية،ممايجعلأنطالياوجهةسياحيةشتويةمميزةلكلمنيودّالهروبمنالشتاءالقارسفيشمالأوروباوآسيا. ولعلّأفضلوقتلزيارةأنطالياوالاستمتاعبمناخهاهوالربيعحتىبدايةالصيف،أيمنمنتصفشهرآذار/مارسوصولاًإلىمنتصفشهرحزيران/يونيو . 
المدينةالقديمةتقعمدينةأنطالياعلىمنحدرصخرييرتفععنالشاطئنحو 40 متراً. واجهتهاالبحريةعبارةعنمتنزّةضخميُعرفبـ«متنزهأتاتورك» Atatürk Parkıالذييمتدعلىعرضمركزالمدينة،وفيهالكثيرمنالمطاعم،والمقاهي،والملاعببحيثيستطيعالسائحالاستمتاعبمشهدبانوراميرائعللشواطئوجبالطوروسفيخلفيتها،خصوصاًفيساعاتالصباحالأولىأوعندالغروب. وبناءعلىنصيحةالأصدقاءالذينزارواأنطالياقبلي،لمأفوّتعلىنفسيفرصةمشاهدةغروبالشمسمنأعلىالمنحدرالصخريوالاستمتاعبجولةحول«متنزهأتاتورك». فيمنتصفالمدينة،تقع«كاليتشي» Kaleiçi،وهيالجزءالتاريخيمنالمدينةالذيبُنيفيعهدالإمبراطوريةالبيزنطية. تشتهرالمنطقةبأسوارهاالعاليةومنارتهاالتيتقفشاهداًعلىتاريخأنطاليا. قمتبجولةفيشوارعهاالضيقةوأزقتهاالمليئةبالمقاهيوالمطاعموالمتاجروصولاًإلىالميناءالقديم Antalya Marina.منهناك،صعدتإلىأحدالقواربفيرحلةبحريةللاستمتاعبجمالالمدينةوسحرجبالطوروسوالشلالات. تكثرالأنشطةوالفعالياتفيالمدينةالقديمةوتنبضفيهاالحياةعلىمدارالعام،وتمتلئالطرقاتبالفنانينوالرسامين،ومحلاتبيعالبوظةالتركيةوالشاورما،والكثيرمنالأسواقالشعبية. 
شواطئأنطالياتعتبرشواطئأنطاليامنأفضلالشواطئفيالعالم،ومنأكثرهاحصولاًعلى«الرايةالزرقاء– Blue Flag»،أيالجائزةالتيتُمنحلأفضلالشواطئالعالمية.علىيمينالمدينة،تمتدشواطئ«لارا» Lara برمالهاالبيضاءالناعمةومياههاالزرقاء. هنا،تتوزعغالبيةالمنتجعاتوالفنادقالضخمة،علماًأنبعضهامنأجملوأفخمالمنتجعاتذاتالشهرةالعالمية. إذاكنتمنهواةالهدوءوالاستلقاءعلىالشاطئ،لاشكفيأنشاطئ«لارا»هووجهتكالمثالية. مكثتشخصياًفيفندقمحاذٍلشاطئ«لارا»،واستمتعتيومياًبروعةالمياهالدافئةونظافةالشاطئالرملي،بحيثكنتأسيرمسافة 5 دقائقفقطللانتقالمنالفندقإلىشاطئالبحروالاستلقاءتحتأشعةالشمسالذهبية.إلىيسارمدينةأنطاليا،يمتدشاطئ«كونيالتي» Konyaalti علىطول 65 كيلومتراًوهومليءبالمقاهيوالمطاعمالشعبية. هذاالشاطئمفتوحللجميعمندونأيرسمدخولأوبرسمرمزي. بمحاذاةهذاالشاطئ،هناكالعديدمنالفنادقومطاعمالمأكولاتالبحريةالتيتزدحمكثيراًخلالالموسمالسياحي. أردتشخصياًاختبارتجربةأنطاليةحقيقية،فتوجهتإلىشاطئ«كونيالتي»والجزءالمحاذيلهمنمركزالمدينة،حيثالشواطئ،ومتنزهأتاتورك،والمتحفوالأسواق،ومدينةالملاهي،والمطاعم،والمدينةالمائية،والمتحفالمائي،والمدينةالمصغّرة،والعديدمنأماكنالجذبالسياحيالأخرى.هناكأيضاًشاطئ«أولمبوس» Olympos Beach،الذييعتبرمنأنقىشواطئأنطالياوأجملها،حيثالمياهالشفافةالتيتتيحرؤيةالحصىفيقاعالمياهعلىعمقثمانيةأمتارتقريباً. تحيطبهذاالشاطئمناطقتاريخيةعدةيمكنزيارتها.أماشاطئ«داملاتاش» Damlatas Beach فهوشاطئرملييقعقربشبهالجزيرةالقديمةفيأنطاليا،أمامكهفداملاتاش. يطلقعلىقسممنهذاالشاطئاسمشاطئكليوباترا. تتميزمياههذاالشاطئبنقائهابحيثيمكنرؤيةالأسماكوالكائناتالبحريةبوضوح. 
أروعالمرافقالسياحيةفيأنطاليا 
هناكالعديدمنالأماكنالتيتستحقالزيارةفيأنطاليا،ومعظمهالايبعدكثيراًعنمركزالمدينة: 
●شلالاتدودن Düden Şelalesi: إنهامجموعةمنالشلالاتعلىنهردودن،تبعد 30 إلى 45 دقيقةعنمركزالمدينة. تتميزهذهالشلالاتبجمالهاالساحروالمتنزهاتالمنتشرةحولها،وهيإحدىأبرزالوجهاتالجاذبةللسياحفيتركيانظراًلجمالهاولوجودأماكنرائعةلالتقاطالصورالتذكارية.يمكنالاستمتاعبمشاهدةالشلالاتمنخلالالركوبفيالسفنالتيتنطلقمنميناء«كاليتشي»وتمرّبجانبهذهالشلالات،أومنخلالالسيرفيالممرالمخصصللزواربالقربمنالشلالات. إنهاتجربةممتعةجداً،لاسيمافيفصلالصيف،حينتكوندرجاتالحرارةمرتفعةومياهالشلالاتمنعشة.ولكلمنيودّالاسترخاءوتناولالطعامالتركيالتقليدي،يمكنهحجزطاولةفيأحدالمطاعمالمنتشرةحولالشلالات. 
●واديكوبرولو Koprulu Kanyon: يعتبرمنأجملالمناطقالسياحيةفيأنطاليا،حيثتجتمعالطبيعةالساحرةمعالآثارالرومانيةالرائعةكالجسرالرومانيالقديم،الذيلايزالقيدالاستخدامحتىاليوم. توجدفيهذهالمنطقةحيواناتبريةكثيرةكالغزلانوالدببةوالأرانبوالماعزالجبلي. ويرتادالواديالكثيرمنهواةالرياضاتالمائيةوالتخييم. 
●متنزهأتاتورك Atatürk Parkı : يمتدالمتنزهعلىطولالواجهةالبحريةأعلىالمنحدرالصخريويحتويعلىمساحاتخضراءشاسعةوممراتجميلة،ويطلعلىالبحرمباشرةبحيثيمكنالاستمتاعبمنظرخلابلشواطئالمدينةوقممجبالطوروس. يضمهذاالمتنزهالعديدمنالمطاعموالمقاهيوالملاعبالرياضية،إضافةإلىمدينةملاهٍللأطفالومساحاتخضراءللاستراحةواللعب. 
●المدينةالمائيةفيأنطاليا Aquapark Dedeman: تبعدبضعدقائقعنمركزالمدينةقربكونيالتي. يحتويهذاالمجمعالمائيعلىالعديدمنالألعابالمائيةوعروضالدلافين. 
●متحفأنطالياالمائي Antalya Aquarium:إنهأحدأكبرالمتاحفالمائيةفيالعالم،وينافسمتحفَيفالنسياوجنوىالمعروفينبكبرمساحتهما. يضمالمتحفآلافالأسماكوالمخلوقاتالبحريةالتيتمجلبهامنكلأنحاءالعالملتمثلنموذجاًحياًلبحارالعالم.يقدممتحفأنطالياالمائيتجربةثقافيةوترفيهيةمميزةمنخلالأكثرمن 40 عرضاً،وأطولنفقتحتالماءبطول 131 متراً. كمايحتويالمتحفعلىأحواضللأسماكويتيحللزوارمشاهدةأسماكالقرشالعملاقةعنكثب.بالإضافةالىالأحواضوالعروضالمائية،يحتويمتحفأنطالياالمائيعلى«عالمالثلج»،وهيقاعةمغلقةومغطاةبالثلوجالطبيعيةبمساحة 1500 مترمربع،فيهابيوتثلجيةتشبةتلكالموجودةفيالقطبالمتجمد،وتنخفضفيهاالحرارةالى -5 درجةمئوية،فيماالحرارةخارجالمتحفتبلغ 40 درجةمئوية. يتمطبعاًمنحالزوارملابسخاصةتقيهمالبردفيعالمالثلج .يقعهذاالأكواريومبمحاذاةحديقةأتاتوركالثقافيةعلىالجانبالشرقيمنشاطئكونيالتي،ويمكنالوصولإليهبسهولةبالباصاتالعامةلعيشمغامرةلاتُنسىفيعالمالبحار. 
●متحفأنطاليا (الهرمالزجاجي) - Antalya Müzesi : يقعهذاالمتحففيحديقةأتاتوركالثقافيةوهوقريبجداًمنالمدينةالمائية. فيهذاالمتحفأكثرمن 30000 منالمقتنياتالأثريةالتيتماكتشافهافيأنطالياوتركيا،وهومحاطبمساحاتخضراءوبحيراتومطاعم. 
●المدينةالمصغّرة MiniCity Antalya: تضممجسماتمصغرةلأهمالمبانيوالآثارالموجودةفيأنطاليا،إضافةالىالعديدمنالمطاعموالمقاهيوالمحلات. تقعهذهالمدينةالمصغّرةعندبدايةشاطئكونيالتيوتبعددقائققليلةفقطعنالمدينةالمائيةوحديقةأتاتوركالثقافية. 
●أوليمبوستيليفريك Olympos Teleferik: إنهأحدأهمالمعالمالواجبزيارتهافيأنطاليا. يبعدهذاالموقعقرابةالساعةعنأنطالياليأخذكفيرحلةعموديةتصلإلىارتفاع 2365 متراًعنسطحالبحر،حيثيمكنالاستمتاعبمشاهدةأنطالياومحيطهامنالأعلى. لكنلابدمنأخذالاحتياطاتاللازمةلناحيةالملابس،لأندرجاتالحرارةتنخفضإلى 10-15 درجةمئويةتقريباً،معرياحشديدة. تصمدالثلوجعلىقمةهذاالموقعحتىنهايةالربيعوبدايةالصيف . 
●واديالجسر: يعدّواديالجسر،أوكمايسمىبالتركية«كوبريليكانيون»،الواقعفيقضاء«مناوغات»فيأنطالياجنوبتركيا،إحدىأهممناطقجذبالسياحمنهواةرياضةالرافتينغأوالتجديف. بالفعل،يبدأموسمالرافتينغفيمنتصفشهرآذار/مارس،ويستمرحتىتشرينالثاني/نوفمبرمنكلعام،معالإشارةإلىأنواديالجسريمتلكأسهلمساراتالرافتينغحولالعالم.الوادي،البالغطولهنحو 14 كيلومتراً،يستقبلهواةالرافتينغمنجميعالأعمار،علماًأنعددالأشخاصالذينيمارسونالرافتينغيومياًيبلغنحو 10 آلافسائحمحليوأجنبي. 
وداعاًأنطاليا 
ليستهذهالمرةالأولىالتيأزورفيهامدينةتركية. إلاأنمدينةأنطالياتحديداًكانلهاالأثرالكبيرفينفسيإذأتاحتليقضاءإجازةرائعةومميزةمععائلتي. أمضيناثمانيةأيامكاملةمفعمةبالفرحوالضحك،واختبرنافيأنطالياالعديدمنالنشاطاتالمائيةوالترفيهية،وتعرفناعلىالعديدمنالمعالمالثقافيةوالحضاريةفيالمدينة. ثمانيةأيامكاملةعشناهافيأنطالياالنابضةبالحياة،فنقلتناإلىعالممليءبالفرحتحتأشعةالشمسالحارقة.

thread.title: South Korean police on alert over Trump protests
thread.title_full: South Korean police on alert over Trump protests

posts.author: KIM TONG-HYUNG Associated Press
posts.title: South Korean police on alert over Trump protests
posts.text:
Mobile & Apps South Korean protesters stage a rally to oppose a visit by U.S. President Donald Trump near the presidential Blue House in Seoul, South Korea, Tuesday, Nov. 7, 2017. The signs held by protesters read: "We oppose Trump's visit." Yonhap via AP Han Jong-chan South Korean protesters stage a rally to oppose a visit by U.S. President Donald Trump near the presidential Blue House in Seoul, South Korea, Tuesday, Nov. 7, 2017. The signs held by protesters read: "We oppose Trump's visit." Yonhap via AP Han Jong-chan South Korean police on alert over Trump protests 
Associated Press  10 AM SEOUL, South Korea 
South Korean police were on high alert in Seoul on Tuesday to monitor protests by both critics and supporters of President Donald Trump as the U.S. leader arrived in the country amid concerns over North Korea's nuclear threats. 
Surrounded by thousands of police officers and a tight perimeter created by buses, hundreds of anti-Trump protesters rallied at a boulevard near the U.S. Embassy, holding banners that read "No Trump" and "No War." 
The demonstrators accused the outspoken president of raising tensions with North Korea and pressuring Seoul to buy more U.S. weapons. They also criticized him for pressing Seoul to re-do a bilateral free trade deal between the countries so that it's more favorable to the United States. 
Across the street, hundreds of Trump supporters waved the U.S. and South Korean flags and held signs that read "Blood Allies Korea + US." They chanted "USA!" when Trump's motorcade passed by the two protest groups for a meeting with South Korean President Moon Jae-in at the presidential Blue House. 
More than 15,000 officers will be deployed to provide security during Trump's two-day visit and monitor the demonstrations, according to the National Police Agency. 
Police had unsuccessfully attempted to block anti-Trump protesters from marching in streets near the presidential palace, with the Seoul Administrative Court ruling that such a ban would infringe on the protesters' freedom of assembly. Dozens of anti-Trump protesters rallied near the presidential office earlier on Tuesday under the close watch of police. 
"We oppose the visit to South Korea by Trump, who has heightened the fears of war on the Korean Peninsula," said one of the protesters, reading from a statement. 
The group, which calls itself the "No Trump Coalition," also plans to protest on Wednesday near Seoul's parliament, where Trump is to make a speech calling on the international community to maximize pressure on North Korea. 
Pro- and anti-Trump protesters have been staging dueling but peaceful protests in Seoul in recent weeks ahead of Trump's visit, reflecting a public deeply divided along ideological and generational lines. 
Many South Koreans are concerned that Trump's fiery rhetoric on North Korea, which has included threats of military options, is raising the risk of an unwanted war on the Korean Peninsula that could cost thousands of South Korean lives. 
Others, including older people who tend to be more conservative, are supportive of Trump's tough stance against the North, which has been accelerating its nuclear weapons and missile tests in recent months, and accuse liberal South Korean President Moon of being too soft on Pyongyang. 
South Korea is known for its vibrant, and occasionally violent, protest culture that sometimes results in significant political changes. Massive but peaceful street protests by millions drove lawmakers to impeach then-President Park Geun-hye over a corruption scandal in December. Park was formally removed from office and arrested in March over charges including bribery and extortion. 
The conservative Korea Freedom Federation released a statement welcoming Trump's visit, which it described as a "God-like move" that would "instantly reverse" the security situation on the peninsula after the allies had been forced to the "defensive" by North Korea's weapons tests. However, the group also lamented Trump's decision not to visit the heavily guarded demilitarized zone between the Koreas during his visit to the South, saying that it might lead North Korea to misjudge that its provocations have hurt the allies' morale. 
Meanwhile, in the Philippines, dozens of protesters burned a portrait of Trump in downtown Manila on Tuesday, saying the president, who will join a summit of East Asian leaders next week in the country, is not welcome there. Members of Kadamay, an alliance of urban poor activists, camped out at a bridge near the presidential palace and chanted "Ban Trump in the Philippines!"

thread.title: Condenan a la "viuda negra" a la horca en Japón
thread.title_full: Condenan a la "viuda negra" a la horca en Japón

posts.title: Condenan a la "viuda negra" a la horca en Japón
posts.text:
INICIO // Mundo // Condenan a la "viuda negra" a la horca en Japón Condenan a la "viuda negra" a la horca en Japón Chisako Kakehi, de 70 años, fue sentenciada por asesinar a tres hombres, incluido uno de sus maridos; acusan que mataba a sus amantes con cianuro para hacerse beneficiaria de sus seguros de vida - A + A 
La septuagenaria japonesa acusada de asesinar con cianuro a sus amantes para quedarse con su dinero , conocida como la " viuda negra ", fue sentenciada a la pena capital este martes por un tribunal de Kioto, un caso que conmocionó al país. 
El tribunal distrital de Kioto sentenció a Chisako Kakehi, de 70 años , a la horca por el asesinato de tres hombres, incluido uno de sus maridos, y por el intento de asesinato de otro, indicó un funcionario judicial. 
El caso de Kakehi se hizo muy conocido por las acusaciones de que había asesinado a varios hombres mayores con los que estaba involucrada, pasando a ser conocida como la "viuda negra", en referencia a una araña que se come a los machos después del apareamiento. 
Los fiscales dijeron que los hombres fallecieron en sus manos después de haberla hecho beneficiaria de sus seguros de vida. 
Según medios, la acusada usó cianuro para deshacerse de sus amantes amasando una fortuna de 1.000 millón de yenes (8,8 millones de dólares, 7,6 millones de euros) en diez años. 
Después perdió la mayor parte de su dinero en operaciones financieras ruinosas y en noviembre de 2014 fue detenida. 
"La acusada hizo que las víctimas bebieran un compuesto con cianuro con intenciones homicidas en los cuatro casos", dijo el juez Ayako Nakagawa al tribunal, según informó la cadena pública NHK. 
Nakagawa desestimó los argumentos de la defensa de que Kakehi no podía ser procesada debido a que sufría demencia. 
Kakehi inicialmente se había negado a testificar al inicio del juicio el pasado mes de junio, pero después conmocionó a la audiencia cuando confesó al tribunal que había asesinado a su cuarto marido en 2013. 
La mujer tuvo relaciones con muchos hombres, la mayoría de los cuales eran de edad avanzada o estaban enfermos. 
Según los medios, la mujer contactaba con sus víctimas usando portales de citas, en los que estipulaba que buscaba parejas con dinero y sin hijos.

thread.title_full: Melihat Kamar Hotel yang Ditempati Bobby dan Keluarganya Saat Siraman

posts.title: Melihat Kamar Hotel yang Ditempati Bobby dan Keluarganya Saat Siraman
posts.text:
Pernikahan Putri Jokowi Melihat Kamar Hotel yang Ditempati Bobby dan Keluarganya Saat Siraman Calon menantu Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi), Bobby Nasution, menjalani prosesi siraman di salah satu kamar tipe Alila Suite   17:26 via TRIBUNSOLO.com DOKUMENTASI HOTEL ALILA SOLO Penampakan private pool di kamar tipe Alila Suit yang akan digunakan siraman Bobby Nasution. 
BANJARMASINPOST.CO.ID, SOLO - Calon menantu Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi), Bobby Nasution , menjalani prosesi siraman di salah satu kamar tipe Alila Suite di Hotel Alila Solo lantai 19. 
Di kamar tersebut terdapat private pool. 
"Lokasi siraman ada di lantai 19 Alila, di kamar bertipe Alila Suite seharga 7,5 juta per malam," kata PR Manager Hotel Alila Solo , Tiwik Widowati, Selasa (7/11/2017) pagi. 
"Dimungkinkan siraman dilakukan di sekitar private poll tersebut," kata Tiwik. 
Menurutnya, di Jawa Tengah, baru Hotel Alila Solo yang mempunyai kamar dengan private pool dan berada di ketinggian. 
Tipe Alila Suite hanya berjumlah 4 kamar saja. 
"Keluarga Bobby menempati kamar di lantai 19 dan 20," katanya. 
"Mas Bobby datang Kamis dan keluarganya Sabtu, mereka akan menginap sampai tanggal 9, tapi mungkin bisa diperpanjang, " imbuh Tiwi.Kamar bertipe Alila Suite yang dipakai Bobby memiliki luas ruangan 90 meter persegi. 
Hanya ada satu kamar yang mengungguli tipe ini, yakni tipe Presidential Suite dengan luas 200 meter persegi dengan perkiraan 15 juta rupiah per malam. 
Di Alila Solo , total terdapat 255 kamar. 
Sebanyak 196 bertipe Deluxe, 50 kamar bertipe Executive. 
Dan 4 kamar bertipe Executive Suite dan Alila Suite. 
Serta satu kamar bertipe Presidential Suite. (*) Tags

thread.title: Nit de tribut al rock salvatge de la banda de Vallirana Desechables
thread.title_full: Nit de tribut al rock salvatge de la banda de Vallirana Desechables

posts.title: Nit de tribut al rock salvatge de la banda de Vallirana Desechables
posts.text:
Cultura Nit de tribut al rock salvatge de la banda de Vallirana Desechables Els Pagesos i J. & J. Produccions organitza dijous aquest homenatge on es podrà veure el documental “El peor dios” i escoltar a la banda tribut Despreciables   10:00h Jordi de Amorós 
Al voltant del llunyà mes de juny del 1988 s’inaugurava el Casal de Joves de Sant Feliu de Llobregat. En un dels actes d’inauguració d’aquest equipament hi va participar una de les bandes més maleïdes de l’escena rock del Baix Llobregat: els Desechables . 
La seva aposta decidida per un rock salvatge (inèdita al panorama dels primers anys 80’s), la seva insultant joventut (liderada per una hipnòtica Tere) i els elements tràgics viscuts al seu voltant (el seu guitarrista original va morir al llarg d’un atracament a una joieria de Vilafranca) van convertir a aquest joves de Vallirana en una de les icones del rock comarcal. 
Ara, vint-i-nou anys després, Els Pagesos Bar Musical i J. J. Produccions organitzen una sessió dedicada a recordar la història d’aquesta banda. Aquest dijous, a les 20h (amb entrada Lliure i taquilla inversa) podrem recuperar l’esperit de la Tere, el Pei i el Miguel amb la projecció del documental “El Peor Dios” (dirigit a sis mans per Alex Montes, Daniel Arasanz i Nicolás Tarela) i el concert tribut a càrrec de Despreciables . 
La banda encarregada de tributar homenatge té un clar tarannà local. A la seva formació hi ha membres que van compartir cartell amb els Desechables a aquell concert del 1988 tocant amb la formació coneguda com KGLLNS (Chase i Manu – gtrs – i Potas – baix -), o d’altres formacions locals (Santi “Putas”– bateria – a Nada Bueno ) La front woman de la banda serà Betty Love que ha col·laborat amb una altra banda mítica de la comarca (La Banda Trapera del Río i Morfi Grey). 
Amb tot això ens espera una nit intensa plena d’emocions que ben segur farà les delícies de la secció més roquera de Sant Feliu. Esteu avisats, jo no m’ho perdria!

posts.title: [알콜중독치료병원X다사랑중앙병원] 폭음하는 여성 역대 최고치…여성 알콜중독 위험!
posts.text:
[알콜중독치료병원X다사랑중앙병원] 폭음하는 여성 역대 최고치 여성 알콜중독 위험!
우리나라 여성 4명 중 1명은 한 달에 1회 이상 폭음을 하는 것으로 나타났습니다.
최근 보건복지부와 질병관리본부 발표 에 따르면 성인 19세 이상 여성의 월간폭음률은 무려 25%에 달했습니다.
여기서 말하는 월간폭음률이란 월간폭음률은 최근 1년 동안 월 1회 이상 한 번의 술자리에서 남자의 경우 7잔(또는 맥주 5캔) 이상, 여자의 경우 5잔(또는 맥주 3캔) 이상 음주한 분율을 뜻하는데요.
이는 2005년 이후 역대 최고치로, 2005년(17.2%)에 비해 7.8% 상승한 수치라고 합니다.
특히 연령별로 보면 19~39세의 월간폭음률이 36.2%로 가장 높았습니다.
20~30대 여성 3명 중 1명은 한 달에 1회 이상 폭음을 한다는 뜻이죠.
반면 남성의 월간폭음률은 53.5%로 작년(54.2%)에 비해 소폭 하락했습니다.
여성의 폭음이 이렇게 증가했다는 건 여성 알코올 의존증 환자 역시 그만큼 늘어난다는 의미로 해석할 수 있는데요.
보건복지부 지정 알코올질환 전문 경기 알콜중독병원 다사랑중앙병원에서 오늘은 여성의 음주가 위험한 이유에 대해 설명해 드리도록 하겠습니다.
여성은 신체 구조상 술을 분해시키는 효소가 남성에 비해 현저히 적습니다.
게다가 남성보다 체지방 비율이 높지만 알코올을 희석하는 수분 비율이 낮아 남성과 같은 양의 술을 마셔도 혈중 알코올 농도가 훨씬 높게 측정됩니다.
즉 남성과 같은 양, 같은 속도로 술을 마셔도 여성이 더 빨리 취하고 알코올 질환에 노출될 위험이 더 큽니다.
실제 남성에 비해 적은 양의 술을 짧은 기간 마셔도 간질환이 발병할 확률은 여성이 2배 이상 높고 뇌도 더 쉽게 쪼그라든다고 합니다.
또한 알코올은 생식기능에도 영향을 미쳐 무월경이나 불임, 유산의 위험성을 높일 수 있죠.
폐경기 여성들의 경우 음주가 유방암이나 골다공증의 위험을 높이는 요인으로 꼽힙니다.
미국의 한 연구에 따르면 하루에 포도주 2잔을 섭취하는 여성은 유방암 발생률이 50% 이상 증가한다고 해요.
특히 임신 중 엄마가 마신 술은 그대로 태아에게 영향을 줍니다.
가장 대표적인 결과가 성장 발달 지연이나 안면기형, 중추신경계 장애와 같은 신체적 문제와 정신지체 등의 문제를 일으키는 태아알코올증후군이죠.
그런데 여성들은 스트레스나 우울감 등 정서적인 문제를 술로 풀다 중독에 빠지거나 우울증, 불면증, 불안증 등을 동반하는 경우가 많습니다.
마음의 문제를 술로 달래려다 자신도 모르게 알콜중독에 빠진 것이지요.
그래서 여성알콜중독 치료는 단순히 술을 끊는 것만이 아니라 술을 마시게 된 원인을 이해하고 심리적 치료 등이 함께 이루어져야 합니다.
문제는 술에 취한 여성을 바라보는 비난의 시선을 피해 공개적인 장소보다 집에서 혼자 몰래 마시는 경향이 높다는 겁니다.
이런 방어적인 행동 때문에 함께 사는 가족들조차 술 문제를 알아채기 쉽지가 않죠.
결국 주변에서 문제를 인식하고 병원을 찾을 때에는 이미 심각한 상태인 경우가 대다수입니다.
하지만 이렇게 치료는커녕 방치되거나 외면 받는 여성도 있습니다.
남성 중독자의 아내는 술에 취한 남편에게 가정폭력을 당하거나 생계까지 책임지는 상황에서도 치료를 지지하고 지원하는 것과 달리 여성 알콜중독자의 남편은 치료에 무관심한 경우가 많습니다.
자녀들조차 술 취한 엄마를 부끄러워하거나 비난하기도 하죠.
결론적으로 여성알콜중독치료는 남성 환자와 질병적 특성은 같지만 치료는 다르게 접근해야 합니다.
알콜중독은 의지의 문제가 아닌 술을 조절하는 뇌의 기능을 상실한 질환이자 시간이 갈수록 악화되는 진행성 질병인 만큼 반드시 전문가의 도움을 받아야 합니다.​​
여성 알콜중독치료는 전국의 알콜중독치료병원 중 가장 먼저 여성병동을 개설하고 여성들의 심리를 고려한 전문 치료를 실시하는 알콜중독 전문 다사랑중앙병원에서 무료 상담을 받아보시길 바랍니다. 보다 자세한 알콜전문상담을 받고 싶으시다면 031-340-5040/5009 으로 전화주시거나 아래 톡톡을 이용해주세요!
※상담 가능시간: 오전 9시~오후 6시
이상, 다사랑중앙병원이었습니다! 감사합니다!

thread.title: サッカーキング：ベジクタシュ幹部、フェライニへの関心を認める「我々のリストに入っている」 - 毎日新聞
thread.title_full: サッカーキング：ベジクタシュ幹部、フェライニへの関心を認める「我々のリストに入っている」 - 毎日新聞

posts.title: サッカーキング：ベジクタシュ幹部、フェライニへの関心を認める「我々のリストに入っている」 - 毎日新聞
posts.text: 今季限りでマンチェスター・Uとの契約が切れるフェライニ [写真]＝AMA/Getty Images ベジクタシュが、マンチェスター・Uに所属するベルギー代表MFマルアン・フェライニの獲得を狙っていることを認めたようだ。イギリスのサッカー誌『FourFourTwo』電子版が伝えている。 現在29歳の同選手は、2013年にエヴァートンから加入。今シーズンの公式戦でもここまで9試合に出場して4得点1アシストを記録するなど、主力として活躍している。 しかし同選手のマンチェスター・Uとの契約は今シーズン限りで満了を迎えるため、同クラブが1年の契約延長オファーを提示したものの、長期契約を望んでいるフェライニはこのオファーを拒否。クラブ側との協議を重ねていると報じられた一方で、退団の可能性も浮上していた。 ベジクタシュは今夏にもフェライニの獲得を狙っていると見られていたが、マンチェスター・Uは放出を拒否。しかし再び冬の移籍市場でも獲得に動くと見られている。 ベジクタシュの幹部メンバーであるメティン・アルバイラク氏は「フェライニは我々のリストに入っているよ」と獲得候補であることを認め、「彼とサインするために力を尽くしている」とコメント。一方で「彼だけの獲得に動いているわけではない」と続け、「我々のスカウティングチームは、この週末だけで20クラブの試合をチェックしている。補強プランは終わることがないんだ。常に動いている」、「クラブはヨーロッパでもトルコ国内でも交渉を続けていて、今冬か今シーズン終了後には数選手と契約したいと考えている」と明かした。 マンチェスター・Uのジョゼ・モウリーニョ監督は今夏「私を手にする方がマルアンを獲得するより簡単だろう」と同選手の放出を断固拒否。指揮官から厚い信頼を寄せられているフェライニは、果たしてどのような決断を下すのだろうか。 【関連記事】

thread.title: Rakuten Super Sale: 15% Rabatt auf alle Super-Deals + 10-fache Superpunkte auf alles
thread.title_full: Rakuten Super Sale: 15% Rabatt auf alle Super-Deals + 10-fache Superpunkte auf alles

posts.title: Rakuten Super Sale: 15% Rabatt auf alle Super-Deals + 10-fache Superpunkte auf alles
posts.text:
Samsung Galaxy S8 für 527,90€ (Preisvergleich: 537€ ) + 60,20€ in Superpunkten Noch mehr sparen – mit Gutscheinen oder Superpunkten 
Es gibt natürlich zahlreiche Angebote bei Rakuten, wir werden allerdings nur die raussuchen, die im Vergleich einigermaßen attraktiv sind. Das soll heißen, dass sie bei anderen Anbietern nicht günstiger zu haben sind. Beachtet, dass ihr die gutgeschriebenen Superpunkte erst beim nächsten Einkauf einlösen könnt. Wenn ihr noch welche von einem vorigen Kauf habt, dann könnt ihr sie allerdings beim Kauf einlösen und den Preis noch besser machen. Alternativ gibt es auch die Möglichkeit Gutscheine anzuwenden: 15€ Rabatt ab 100€ MBW – für ADAC-Mitglieder mit dem Gutscheincode: ADAC12 Was ist der Rakuten Club? 
Gerade hat Rakuten ein neues Kundenprogramm gestartet: den Rakuten Club . Für einen Mitgliedsbeitrag von 19,99€ im Jahr bekommen Mitglieder zusätzliche Vorteile. Vor allem das Upgrade bei den Superpunkten ist ein großer Vorteil. So können sich Mitglieder länger als die üblichen 30 Wochen Zeit lassen, um die gutgeschreibenen Superpunkte einzusetzen. Mit dem Rakuten Club bleiben 365 Tage gültig. kostenloser Versand und Rückversand (außer Speditionsware) 5-fach Superpunkte auf jeden Artikel Superpunkte sind 365 Tage gültig Rakuten TV Filmtastic inklusive Rakuten Viber-Anbindung für weltweite Telefonate mit Superpunkten zum Start: 2 x 400 Superpunkte gratis 
Dazu gibt es regulär die 5-fache Punktezahl, die auch mit die Aktionen kombinierbar ist. Daher gibt es beim aktuellen Super-Sale für Club-Mitglieder die 15-fache statt der 10-fachen Superpunkte. Weitere Vorteile ist der kostenlose Versand und Rückversand sowie der Gratis-Zugriff auf Raktuen TV Filmtastic. Genaue Infos zum Rakuten Club findet ihr in unserem Artikel . Was sind Rakuten Superpunkte? 
Wer bei Rakuten.de einkauft, wird früher oder später über die Superpunkte stolpern. Diese werden euch gutgeschrieben, wenn ihr etwas im Shop bestellt habt. Pro ausgegebenen Euro gibt es einen Punkt, der einen Gegenwert von einem Cent hat. Kauft ihr zum Beispiel für 300€ ein, gibt es 300 Superpunkte, die einen Wert von 3€ haben. Altuell könnt ihr bis zu 25-fache Superpunkte abstauben – das würde bei einem Einkaufswert von 300€ also 7.500 Punkten und damit 75€ für euren nächsten Einkauf entsprechen. 
16 Tage nach Versand der Bestellung bekommt ihr eure Superpunkte gutgeschrieben. Von da an sind sie 30 Tage gültig und können für euren nächsten Einkauf bei Rakuten.de genutzt werden. Pro Kunde können im Rahmen der Aktion offiziell maximal 10.000 Superpunkte gesammelt werden, was 100€ entspricht. Nutzungsbedingungen: 
Mit dem angegebenen Gutscheincode (RAKUTEN2017) erhalten Kunden mit Kundenkonto 15% Rabatt (exklusive Versandkosten) auf teilnehmende und gekennzeichnete Produkte (SUPER-DEALS), wenn Sie sich bei der Bestellung oder zuvor mit einem Kundenkonto bei Rakuten registriert haben. Der Gutschein ist gültig vom 07.11.2017 (09:00 Uhr), nur solange der Gutschein-Vorrat reicht, bis spätestens 10.11.2017 (09:00 Uhr). Der maximale Rabatt pro Produkt beträgt 75,– Euro. Kein Mindesteinkaufswert. Pro Bestellung und Kunde ist nur ein Gutschein einlösbar und es ist keine Kombination mit anderen Rabatten möglich. Zusätzlich erhalten Kunden mit Kundenkonto während dieser Aktion 10-fache Superpunkte auf ihren Warenkorb (exklusive Versandkosten). Je Kundenkonto und Kunde können pro Monat maximal 100.000 Rakuten Superpunkte gesammelt werden. Zum Schnäppchenfuchs-Newsletter anmelden & nichts mehr verpassen! Mit Freunden teilen

posts.title: Внедорожный Kia Rio: он оказался чуть дороже Весты Кросс - автоновости - Авто
posts.text:
Самый доступный Kia Rio X-Line оснащается 1,4-литровым двигателем мощностью 100 л.с. и 6-ступенчатой механической коробкой передач. (С 6-диапазонным автоматом машина стоит уже 814 900 рублей). Таким образом, корейская новинка оказалась лишь чуть дороже своего главного конкурента, «приподнятого» универсала Lada Vesta SW Cross — за вазовский псевдокроссовер со 106-сильным мотором 1.6 и механикой дилеры просят от 755 900 рублей.
За 775 тысяч корейцы отдают отнюдь не «пустышку». В базовой комплектации присутствуют кондиционер, «электрические» стёкла спереди и сзади, пара подушек безопасности, АБС и — внимание — система стабилизации! Кроме того, заявлены помощник при старте на подъеме и даже система контроля за давлением в шинах. И никакой экономии, есть даже «музыка», а также подогревы передних кресел и рулевого колеса.
C мотором 1.6 (123 л.с.) Rio X-Line стоит без 100 рублей 800 тысяч. А далее — по нарастающей. thread.title: دولت ترامپ «وضعیت اضطراری» در قبال ایران را تمدید کرد
thread.title_full: دولت ترامپ «وضعیت اضطراری» در قبال ایران را تمدید کرد

posts.author: سام پارسی (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: دولت ترامپ «وضعیت اضطراری» در قبال ایران را تمدید کرد
posts.text:
دولت ترامپ «وضعیت اضطراری» در قبال ایران را تمدید کرد دونالد ترامپ در حال حاضر در سفر آسیایی خود به سر میبرد؛ فرمان ۱۲۱۷۰ روز ۱۵ آبان تمدید شدهاست 
ارسال دونالد ترامپ، رئیسجمهوری ایالات متحده، «وضعیت اضطراری» آن کشور در قبال ایران، که از زمان اشغال سفارت آمریکا در تهران در سال ۱۳۵۸ جریان دارد، را مجددا برای یک سال دیگر تمدید کرد . این نخستین بار است که این فرمان توسط آقای ترامپ تمدید میشود؛ او کمتر از یک سال پیش ریاست دولت ایالات متحده را در دست گرفت. باراک اوباما و دیگر رئیسان جمهوری ایالات متحده طی دهههای گذشته دستور به تمدید این فرمان داده بودند. بنا بر دستور ۱۵ آبان ترامپ، که وبسایت کاخ سفید آن را منتشر کرده «وضعیت اضطراری» ملی در قبال ایران «بر پایه فرمان اجرایی ۱۲۱۷۰» و «برای مقابله با تهدیدهای نامعمول و غیرعادی علیه امنیت ملی، سیاست خارجی و اقتصاد ایالات متحده» تمدید میشود. در این اطلاعیه گفته شده «روابط ما با ایران هنوز به حالت عادی بازنگشته و روند اجرای توافقهای ۱۹ ژانویه ۱۹۸۱ با ایران همچنان در جریان است». در اطلاعیه کاخ سفید تاکید شده که فرمان اجرایی ۱۲۱۷۰ متمایز از وضعیت اضطراری در فرمان اجرایی ۱۲۹۵۷ است که در مارس ۱۹۹۵ صادر شد. تمدید فرمان مربوط به وقایع پس از انقلاب در ایران نیز جدا از فرمان ۱۹۹۵ است که خود در ژانویه گذشته تمدید شده و در حال حاضر جریان دارد. فرمان دوم را آخرین بار باراک اوباما، یک هفته پیش از آنکه ترامپ رسما سوگند ریاستجمهوری بخورد، تمدید کرده بود. فرمان اجرایی ۱۲۱۷۰ دولت ایالات متحده را، جیمی کارتر، رئیسجمهوری وقت، ده روز پس از جریان حمله به سفارت ایالات متحده در تهران و گروگانگیری کارکنان آمریکایی آن در پی انقلاب ۵۷، صادر کرده بود. دولت ایران تا زمانی که رونالد ریگان، رقیب جمهوریخواه آقای کارتر، در جریان انتخابات، رسما بهعنوان رئیسجمهوری جدید آمریکا کار خود را آغاز نکرد، از آزاد کردن گروگانها سرباز زد. گفته میشود این کار عملا در واکنش به سیاستهای کارتر انجام شد. با وجود اینها وضعیت اضطراری، تعلیق قراردادها، مسدود شدن دسترسی به داشتههای پولی ایران و تحریمها و فشارهای اقتصادی ناشی از آن، چه در زمان ریاستجمهوری ریگان و نیز طی چهار دهه گذشته ادامه داشتهاست. «وضعیت اضطراری» ملی در قبال ایران، بخشی از یک قانون فدرال است به نام «اختیارات اقتصادی اضطراری در سطح بینالمللی» که به رئیسجمهوری آمریکا اجازه میدهد در صورت احساس خطر از سوی هر منبع خارجی، وضعیت اضطراری اعلام و تحریمهایی را برقرار کند.

posts.author: RedADN
posts.title: Sony detalla sus planes en la PlayStation Experience 2017
posts.text:
Sony detalla sus planes en la PlayStation Experience 2017 
Ghost Of Tsushima, de Sucker Punch, y Dreams, de Media Molecule, son los primeros juegos confirmados 07/11/2017 10:07 La presentación de Sony en la PlayStation Experience 2017 tendrá lugar el viernes 8 de diciembre 
Sony Interactive Entertainment ha comunicado a través de su blog americano sus planes en su propia feria, la PlayStation Experience 2017 , que este año celebra su cuarta edición repitiendo localización en la ciudad de Anaheim, California. La compañía tiene previsto realizar una presentación durante el viernes 8 de diciembre a las 20:00 (horario peninsular) donde Sid Shuman , uno de los representantes de la compañía, ofrecerá las noticias, contando con eventos especiales, anuncios e incluso detalles de juegos ya anunciados. Ghost of Tsushima y Dreams confirman su asistencia a la PlayStation Experience 2017 
Se espera que la compañía amplíe información de algunos de sus anuncios de la Paris Games Week 2017, donde no faltaron juegos de gran calibre como ' The Last of Us Part II ', ' God of War ', ' Spider-Man PS4 ' o ' Detroit: Become Human '. Sin embargo, la compañía solo ha confirmado de momento la asistencia de proyectos como ' Ghost Of Tsushima ', de Sucker Punch, y ' Dreams ', de Media Molecule. Cabe destacar que tras esta conferencia inaugural los asistentes podrán probar juegos, además de realizar otras actividades, en esta feria que se extenderá los días 9 y 10 de diciembre. 
Este año, Sony ha aumentado un 50% el espacio de la feria PlayStation Experience 2017 para poder alojar más actividades a realizar entre todos los asistentes, destacando una competención de ' Gran Turismo Sport ' o tiendas de merchandising más grandes. Por tanto, se deja entrever que este año tocará una edición centrada más en la asistencia a la feria para poder disfrutar de los videojuegos restando importancia a los anuncios de futuros títulos, aunque no será hasta el viernes 8 de diciembre cuando salgamos de duda sobre qué nos deparará la PlayStation Experience 2017, una feria en la que su edición anterior reveló numerosas novedades.

La décision a été annoncée en septembre dernier : les femmes vont enfin pouvoir conduire; la mesure sera effective en juin prochain. thread.title: Implenia baut neues Verwaltungsgebäude für die UNO
thread.title_full: Implenia baut neues Verwaltungsgebäude für die UNO

posts.title: Implenia baut neues Verwaltungsgebäude für die UNO
posts.text:
Bild in Lightbox öffnen. Bildlegende: Implenia mit Hauptsitz in Dietlikon (ZH) beschäftigt 8200 Menschen und erzielte 2016 einen Umsatz von 3,3 Mrd. Franken. Keystone Der grösste Schweizer Baukonzern, Implenia, baut das neue Verwaltungsgebäude für die UNO in Genf. Das Auftragsvolumen beträgt 100 Millionen Franken. Das Gebäude auf einem Grundstück von rund 25'000 Quadratmetern wird Ende November 2019 fertig sein. Ziel ist es, alle Mitarbeitenden der Vereinten Nationen auf dem Gelände des Palais des Nations zusammenzubringen. 
Beim Bau handelt es sich um das erste Projekt, bei welchem Implenia eine neue Nachhaltigkeitsinitiative umsetzt. Im Rahmen dieser Initiative dokumentiert Implenia zusammen mit dem Hochschulinstitut für internationale Studien und Entwicklung (IHEID) in Genf den Bauprozess des neuen Verwaltungsgebäudes und die umgesetzten Umweltmassnahmen. 
Diese Dokumentation soll die UNO unterstützen, den Transfer von Wissen und Kompetenzen über nachhaltige Bautechniken und -methoden im Sinne ihrer Nachhaltigkeitsziele zu fördern. 
Zudem schafft Implenia gemeinsam mit dem Integrationsbüro für Ausländer des Kantons Genf (BIE) Beschäftigungsmöglichkeiten für Flüchtlinge auf der Baustelle. SRF 4 News, 10:00 Uhr/sda/galc;from

thread.title: Shilpa Shetty gives a fusion twist to a contemporary plaid skirt; see how | The Indian Express
thread.title_full: Shilpa Shetty gives a fusion twist to a contemporary plaid skirt; see how | The Indian Express

posts.author: Lifestyle Desk
posts.title: Shilpa Shetty gives a fusion twist to a contemporary plaid skirt; see how | The Indian Express
posts.text:
Karisma Kapoor welcomes winter in this classy Anavila outfit 
When it comes to keeping it casual yet glamorous, Shilpa Shetty is one of the few Bollywood actors who have always managed to impress us. While she has mastered the art of elegantly tying up saris to accessorising the six yards with belts, the fashionista has managed to bowl us over with her occasional contemporary numbers as well. 
This is one such time, when Shetty donned a chic plaid outfit at the announcement of the Mumbai Fest. We like her stark white top with balloon sleeves from Shanghai Tang, which she paired with a classy Zara plaid skirt with rose embroidery. See pics. 
One might think of it as a shot in the dark but it seems teaming up her contemporary outfit with ethnic shoes seems to have worked out for the actor. The red heels in a traditional tone from Miu Miu did not look odd, rather added an interesting element to the actor’s look. 
Shetty has been known to play up fusion fashion to the hilt and this time too she hit the mark. We can totally steal this look, which is a great winter fashion inspiration for sure. 
The actor toted a casual grey sling bag, which contrasted with the stark white of her top nicely. Golden bracelets and pearl earrings kept the attire toned down and sophisticated. Minimal make-up, nude lips and soft curls rounded out her look well. 
We think the actor’s style game was on point. What about you? Let us know in the comments below.   © IE Online Media Services Pvt Ltd More Related News

Berenberg Vermögensverwalter Office: Die Private Equity Brille - ein Werkzeug für Nebenwerte? 
Der Blickwinkel, aus dem sich Private Equity Analysten ein Unternehmen ansehen hilft ungemein, um bei europäischen Nebenwerten interessante Renditepotenziale zu erkennen und zu heben. Hiervon sind Felix Eisel und Alex Nieberding so überzeugt, dass sie sich aus leitender Position bei einem Private Equity Unternehmen in die Selbständigkeit begeben haben. 
- Wie unterscheidet sich ihr Vorgehen vom herkömmlichen Identifizieren der Aktien-Werttreiber?

thread.title_full: Ingenico Improves Global Application Performance With Masergy's SD-WAN Pro

posts.title: Ingenico Improves Global Application Performance With Masergy's SD-WAN Pro
posts.text: | 07.11.2017, 10:01 | 55 | 0 | 0 Global Leader in Seamless Payment Implements Agile Network Across 88 Locations PARIS, Nov. 07, 2017 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Masergy , a leading provider of hybrid networking , managed security and cloud communications solutions, today announced that Ingenico Group, the global leader in seamless payment, has selected the company's award-winning managed SD-WAN Pro to support its global operations. Ingenico has led the payments industry for nearly 40 years. It is the trusted partner of bank and acquirers as well as retailers and e-merchants worldwide. Its in-store, online and omnichannel payment services help 250,000 merchants expand their business across borders and channels. Ingenico enables banks and acquirers to reduce the complexity of managing payments and differentiate their offer from the competition, notably with the world's largest payment method portfolio. Masergy's fully managed SD-WAN Pro provides high performance, agile networking for Ingenico's global offices and data centres. Masergy enables Ingenico to reap the benefits of SD-WAN technology while offering flexible connectivity options that meet its evolving business needs and application performance. "We ran a four-month RFP to equip our global estate of 88 sites with a managed SD-WAN solution. We investigated all major operators and vendors available and decided to partner with Masergy because of the maturity of its SD-WAN service offering, global implementation expertise and personalised technical support," said Jean-Marc Voelckel, CIO, Ingenico Group. "Masergy offers us a unique fully managed solution for our business. With Masergy SD-WAN, we have lowered our total cost of operations." "SD-WAN can make your network more agile with centralised control and management. A managed SD-WAN solution lets organizations more rapidly deploy new sites, optimize application performance and support bandwidth-hungry applications," said Masergy CTO Tim Naramore. "We are proud that Ingenico chose to partner with us for the deployment of our fully managed solution. It's proof that unlike many of our competitors, Masergy SD-WAN is ready and able to tackle the real, large-scale deployments that global enterprises, such as Ingenico, need." thread.title: Harcèlement dans les transports: "il y a des comportements à dénoncer"
thread.title_full: Harcèlement dans les transports: "il y a des comportements à dénoncer"

posts.author: Par AFP
posts.title: Harcèlement dans les transports: "il y a des comportements à dénoncer"
posts.text:
- A + A 
Une main aux fesses, un regard insistant, des "vas-y que je te colle": les transports publics sont propices aux comportements sexistes, un problème qui appelle à adopter certaines "stratégies d'évitement", témoignent des usagères. 
"Bonjour, vous empruntez cette ligne régulièrement? Vous sentez-vous en sécurité?": postées à un arrêt du Tramway 1, à Bobigny près de Paris, Romane Parent et Camille Reynaud interrogent des femmes. 
Dans le cadre du Tour de France de l'Egalité, lancé par le gouvernement, ces deux femmes de 23 ans en service civique à la Direction régionale aux Droits des femmes ont décidé de s'intéresser au harcèlement dans les transports et "donner la parole à celles qu'on n'interroge jamais". 
"Le but, c'est de mettre en lumière les risques pour les femmes dans les transports publics et la fréquence de ces risques", explique à l'AFP Romane. 
Véronique, habitante de Bobigny, emprunte cette ligne qui dessert plusieurs villes de Seine-Saint-Denis et des Hauts-de-Seine "plusieurs fois par jour" pour aller au travail et récupérer sa fille tous les soirs au conservatoire. 
"Je n'ai pas peur pour moi, mais pour elle. Elle a 14 ans, je ne veux pas qu'elle rentre seule le soir", leur répond-elle. "Il y a encore quelques semaines, le tramway a dû être arrêté et évacué après une bagarre: un homme avait mal regardé la petite amie d'un autre". 
- "Éviter les regards" - 
Chiffre éloquent, 100% des utilisatrices des transports en commun ont subi au moins une fois dans leur vie harcèlement sexiste ou agression sexuelle, selon un rapport du Haut conseil à l'égalité entre les femmes et les hommes basé sur les réponses de 600 Franciliennes. 
"Des mains aux fesses, des sifflements, des inconnus qui me suivent, j'en ai connus. Pas sur cette ligne, mais dans le métro, le RER", témoigne à un autre arrêt Carmelle, 29 ans. "Le pire c'est aux heures de pointe: vas-y que je te colle." 
Selon elle, il faudrait "un agent posté à chaque entrée de métro, de RER ou de tram aux heures de pointe. On éviterait la fraude, on créerait des liens avec les usagers, et les femmes auraient quelqu'un vers qui se tourner en cas de souci". 
Promiscuité dans les wagons, manque de places assises, faible éclairage le soir, présence majoritairement masculine à certaines heures... Au fil des questionnaires, Camille et Romane entendent les mêmes remarques. 
Dans un moment de libération de la parole après l'Affaire Weinstein, Hania, 22 ans, juge important de "dénoncer aussi les comportements inappropriés, ici, dans les transports". 
"C'est beaucoup de ressenti, heureusement tout n'est pas suivi d'actes, mais quand on subit des remarques, des regards tous les matins, ça ne met pas de bonne humeur pour commencer la journée", témoigne cette étudiante. 
Comme beaucoup, elle adopte des stratégies d'évitement: "Je prends un livre, un magazine, ou je regarde mon téléphone pour éviter les regards". 
Pour Claire Vercken, déléguée aux Droits des femmes et à l'Egalité en Seine-Saint-Denis, cette étude doit être vue comme un "point de départ" pour travailler avec la RATP, les collectivités, et "nourrir une réflexion globale" sur la sécurité dans les transports. 
"La mobilité des femmes et leur place dans l'espace public sont des questions importantes. L'insécurité dans les transports peut entraver la mobilité, c'est donc un grand enjeu, notamment en termes d'emploi", justifie-t-elle. 
Depuis 2016, SNCF et RATP ont mis en commun le numéro d'alerte 3117 (31177 par SMS), joignable à tout moment pour signaler agression ou harcèlement. Il sera prochainement disponible sur l'application mobile vianavigo, a précisé à l'AFP IDF Mobilités. 
Début 2018, les opérateurs de transports publics lanceront une nouvelle campagne de sensibilisation au harcèlement. L'une des dernières rappelait les peines encourues: 6 mois de prison et 22.500 euros d'amende pour injures ou menaces, cinq ans de prison et 75.000 euros d'amende pour baisers forcés, mains aux fesses, frottements. 
Après Nantes, Bordeaux expérimente depuis lundi l'arrêt à la demande dans deux lignes de bus de nuit, entre deux arrêts, pour "déposer le voyageur au plus près de son domicile". 
Auteur : Par AFP

posts.title: 제1회 구리시 뷰티 페스티벌에서 정수옥 원장의 "예얼RS두피케어" 시연으로 인기 만점!
posts.text:
유익한 정보 제1회 구리시 뷰티 페스티벌에서 정수옥 원장의 "예얼RS두피케어" 시연으로 인기 만점! 2시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 지도로 보기 전체지도 지도닫기 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/yeal_1/221134630873 미용인들의 권익신장과 미용발전 그리고 지역경제 활성화를 위하여
(사)대한미용사회 구리지부 정금분 지부장이 주최하고 구리시가 후원한
제1회 구리시 뷰티 페스티벌 이 구리시 여성 노인회관 대강당 에서
화려하게 개최 되었었는데요
구리시장님, 구리시의회의장님, 정금분 구리시지부장님,구리시관계자 여러분께
미용인의 한 사람으로 감사의 말을 올립니다.
관과 협회가 하나가 되어 구리시 뷰티산업의 경쟁력을 높이고
전국 뷰티 종사자간 상호교류는 물론 시민들에게 볼거리와
체험거리를 함께 선사한 기획이 전국 뷰티 산업발전에 밑거름이
되리라 확신합니다.
그리고 더욱 의미가 있었던 것은 서울 관악구 김선녀 지회장님 의 도움으로
행사의 완성도를 높이며 화려함의 극치를 보여 주었는데요
지역을 가리지 않고 미용인들끼리 서로 도와 뷰티산업을 이끌어 가는 모습들이
너무 아름다웠고 의미가 있었습니다^^
구리시 여성 노인회관 3층 대강당에서 뷰티 페스티벌이(오후4시~6시까지) 열렸고요
1층에서는 헤어스케치 작품 전시회가 열려 또 다른 볼거리를 제공하였는데요.
전문가가 봐도 수준들이 상당했습니다.
그리고 제1회 구리시 뷰티 페스티벌이 열리는 3층 대강당 입구에서
정수옥 원장의 "예얼RS두피케어" 시연이 있었는데요.
구리시 관계자분들과 시민들의 참여로 그 호응은 뜨거웠습니다.
예얼RS두피케어는 경락/경혈/근막/림프 마사지의 특장점만 뽑아 대체의학과 결합하여
"예얼 청혈마사지"를 탄생시긴 정수옥 원장의 25년 노하우가 집약된 두피케어로
머리속이 맑아지고, 스트레스가 확 날라가고, 얼굴피부는 백옥이 되고, 광대는 축소되고
볼 살이 빠지고, 목둘레 감소는 물론 비대칭이었던 얼굴이 균형이 정확히 맞아지고
얼굴은 어느새 V라인이 형성되어 동안 얼굴이 됩니다.
한마디로 얼굴도 예뻐지고 피부는 5~10전으로 되돌아 갑니다.
그 뿐만 아니고 지속적으로 예얼RS두피케어를 받으면 모발이 굵어져 탈모가 예방되고,
머리카락이 자라 모발이 풍성해지면서 찰랑이는 머리결을 얻을 수 있어요.
거기에 더해 뇌질환 예방까지 할 수 있어..
다른 마사지 샵과는 그 차원이 다릅니다.
예얼RS두피케어는 근본적으로 "예얼청혈마사지"로 우리 몸의 세포를 급격히 활성화 시켜
혈류의 흐름을 원할하게 하여 신진대사를 촉발시켜 우리 몸 스스로가 자가치유회복력을
최고치로 이끌어내는 근본적인 치유방법으로 그 효과가 확실하고 오래 지속됩니다.
한국경제tv(세발자전거)/미용방송 TV Hair/미용 매거진 등..
언론과 방송에서 이미 인정한 두피케어 기술로 국내 최고의 원천기술을
정수옥 원장이 갖고 있어요.
우리 몸의 세포를 원천 회복시켜 주는 예얼 청혈마사지를 근간으로 하여 등/복부 관리까지 포함하여
예얼 웨딩케어란 상품이 탄생되었고, 모발관리까지 포함하여 "프레미엄 예얼RS두피/모발케어"란
국내 최고의 상품이 탄생하였습니다.
정수옥헤어&예얼두피 서울특별시 동작구 상도로 382 전화 상세보기

thread.title: Шэрон Стоун шокировала поклонников фотографиями в купальнике
thread.title_full: Шэрон Стоун шокировала поклонников фотографиями в купальнике

posts.author: sseverina
posts.title: Шэрон Стоун шокировала поклонников фотографиями в купальнике
posts.text: Новости , Папарацци 7 Ноябрь 2017, 12:30 В свои 59 лет актриса Шэрон Стоун выглядит просто сногсшибательно. Знаменитость тщательно за собой следит, ведя здоровый образ жизни, а это отражается положительным образом на ее молодости и стройной фигуре. Шэрон можно считать настоящим примером для подражания, о чем свидетельствуют ее недавние снимки папарацци с пляжа в Майами. Накануне вездесущие папарацци запечатлели Шэрон Стоун во время ее отдыха на одном из пляжей. Для плаванья актриса выбрала купальник темно-синего света со слитным кроем. Он выгодно подчеркнул превосходную фигуру женщины. Не побоялась Стоун выйти на пляж и без грамма косметики. Фаны были удивлены, что в свои года она выглядит настолько свежо и молодо. Напомним, что ранее Шэрон Стоун сделал заявление, что она против пластической косметологии. Стоун зареклась ни за что не ложиться на операционный стол к пластическому хирургу.

thread.title: Google Pixel 2 November Security Update Resolves OLED, Noise Issues
thread.title_full: Google Pixel 2 November Security Update Resolves OLED, Noise Issues

posts.title: Google Pixel 2 November Security Update Resolves OLED, Noise Issues
posts.text:
Ever since Google Pixel 2 series was launched last month it has been plagued by a host of issues ranging from Android not booting on Pixel XL handsets to the display becoming dull to a clicking noise being heard while tapping on the touchscreen of the device.
In a community post on Oct. 27, Google had assured users that it would sort out these issues in a future software update.
Now the company has finally issued that update. The November security update for the Pixel 2 series handsets is now available, and it fixes many of the issues plaguing the handsets.
OLED display issue 
One of the most enticing features of the Pixel 2 is its OLED display. The display, expected to perform better than traditional displays due to its vibrancy, also has its own issues. In the Pixel 2, the issue was that the OLED showed muted colors. The color balance of the display was off and caused the display to be under saturated. The update resolves this issue by adding a new saturated color mode, so that users can determine how vibrant they want the display to be.
Another pertinent issue was that of the display burn-in. OLED displays degenerate over time, and pixel by pixel they die out. However, this was happening much faster on the Pixel 2 and the Pixel 2 XL.
Google had denied that this issue occurred due to an oversight in quality control. Instead, the company has issued a software update for what seems to be a hardware issue.
“This update also brings planned UI changes which extend the life of the OLED display, including a fade out of the navigation buttons at the bottom of the screen and an update to maximum brightness. These features have been carefully designed so as not to detract from the user experience. Since all OLED displays experience some degree of decay over time, we’ll continue to make enhancements which maximize the life of your Pixel screen,” the company stated in its community post  Monday.
The company claims that its software update will eliminate the fade in on the display.
Clicking noises on the display 
The update also resolves the issue of clicking noises on the display. The issue was expected to have emerged due to issues with the device’s Near Fields Communication radio. The faint clicking noise is expected to not occur anymore when you tap the display.
The company has promised a December software update and monthly updates thereafter. The company needs to push out updates faster since it is facing competition from the likes of Samsung Galaxy S8, Note 8, Apple iPhone X and LG V30.
Along with the update, Pixel 2 devices will also receive the November security update, which includes a patch for the KRACK vulnerability.
